		Question: what kind of music did jimi hendrix play
		Answer:
answer:
The answer is "Electric Rock and Roll".

Jimi Hendrix was an American musician, singer, and songwriter who is considered one of the most influential electric guitarists of all time, as well as one of the most significant cultural icons of the 1960s. With his unmatched musical dexterity and innovative use of feedback and fuzz, he revolutionized the electric guitar, blurring the line between music and art. Hendrix's musical style encompassed psychedelic rock, psychedelic folk, experimental rock, jam
